sql-command: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Users(UserId INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, UserName varchar(255), UserPW varchar(255), UserMail varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY(UserId));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UserMatches(MatchId INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, UserPlace INT UNSIGNED, UserKills INT UNSIGNED, UserPlayTime INT, MatchDate DATETIME, UserId INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(UserId) REFERENCES Users(UserId), PRIMARY KEY(MatchId));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS AccessTokens(TokenId INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, TokenVal varchar(255), TokenExpiration DATETIME, PRIMARY KEY(TokenId));
